name: Expert Beast Gunner Spellcasting
summary: You've learned the deeper secrets of beast guns, making you an expert in the magic they grant you.
description:
You've learned the deeper secrets of beast guns, making you an expert in the magic they grant you. You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.Expert Beast Gunner Spellcasting Leads To...
